intro: Chlorophytum strictum, commonly known as the Tiger's Tail, is a member of the Asparagaceae family. It is a flowering plant native to South Africa, characterized by its upright growth habit and long, narrow leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, white or pale blue flowers during the summer months. Its leaves are often striped with green and white, giving it a distinctive appearance. It is a popular houseplant due to its ease of care and attractive foliage.
